translations: 还击，机敏的回答（riposte 的名词复数）

sentences.sentence: The name-calling — "goggles", "four-eyes", "prof" — was annoying, but left no lasting scars. The sharp-tongued ripostes you develop are useful in all areas of life.
sentences.translation: “眼镜”、“四眼”、“教授”这样的绰号很烦人，但也没有给我留下什么永久性伤害。还击中练就的伶牙俐齿倒是在生活中的各个方面都挺有用的。
